title: Premier League total broadcasting payments to clubs 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Broadcasting payments in million GBP has rose over the Year.

Broadcasting payments in million GBP is roughly constant from 2011/12 to 2012/13, gradually increasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16, gradually increasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and finally roughly constant from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015/16 and 2016/17.
The highest Broadcasting payments in million GBP, of value 2419.6 was reached at Year 2017/18
Minimum Broadcasting payments in million GBP about 1055.0 was reached at Year 2011/12
